Method Detail

tryOp

static java.lang.Object tryOp(java.lang.Class service, java.util.Map supportedOps, java.lang.Object[] classArgs, java.lang.String methodName, java.lang.Object[] methodArgs)
Attempt to call an operation using the given parameters.
throws:
GrgitException if the operation failed
throws:
MissingMethodException if the requested method doesn't correspond to a supported operation
Parameters:
service - the service class to call the method on
supportedOps - a map of operation method names to operation classes supported on the service class
classArgs - the arguments to instantiate the operation class
methodName - the method requested on the service
methodArgs - the arguments requested on the method
Returns:
the result of the operation
